Address.Address1: DIVAN YOLU 76 TRAMVAY YOLU UZERI SULTANAHMET

Description.Text: Welcome to Faros Hotel Istanbul, a luxury boutique Hotel located in the Old City of Istanbul adjacent to The Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Basilica Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Byzantium Hippodrome and many more. Faros Hotel Istanbul offers 23 generously sized guest rooms including 3 corner suites. Each spacious and individually decorated guest rooms and corner suites invite for a memorable stay. Faros Hotel Istanbul combines exceptional service standard and upscale surroundings to serve as a stylish oasis in the heart of Old City Istanbul. The hotel also offers dry cleaning, lobby and reception.

Faros Hotel Istanbul located in the heart of Old City Istanbul on the Divanyolu Street steps away form the highlights of the city like Blue Mosque, Topkap Palace, Hagia Sophia, Basilica Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Byzantium Hippodrome and many more. On the center of public transportation alternatives and 1 minute by foot to Sultanahmet Tram Station and by using Kabatas - Taksim line 20 minutes to Taksim Square. 12 km to Atatrk International Airport and 55 km to Sabiha Gokcen International Airport. Public transportation is available from Ataturk International Airport to Faros Hotel Istanbul. by using the subway Airport to Zeytinburnu and change to tram line Zeytinburnu to Sultanahmet. All trip is 25 minutes.

Single Room - Single Room offers two twin beds or one double bed with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, modem / data port connection, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. All rooms with private bathroom with bathtub, free high speed and wireless internet connection, flat screen HD LCD TV, satellite system, music, self control air - conditioning , emergency life alarm, 1.5L complimentary water per day.
